All serials are now blocked.  The crack is for version 7.5.0 which does not work with this version.  No viruses found.

Ok:

1) Install "avgas-setup-7.5.1.43"
2) Right click on the logo next to your clock (should have a little S in it), and disable "start with windows". Then right click again, and click exit.
3) Copy the Crack aplication to c drive, program files, Grisoft, Anti Spyware 7.5.
4) Open up the Crack application, click on the word "crack" and then select the .exe you want to crack. It should say "succesful"
5) Rename avgas.exe to _avgas.exe, and run it.
6) Finally, right click on the logo again and enable "start with windows". You will have to update your version first, which works fine.

Btw - I am using Vista.

Meh..I only downloaded this as a temporary fix due to the fact that every time avg installs an update the crack gets removed. :-(

You're better off getting one with a serial then a crack.

P.s.if I'm doing something wrong and that is the reason it keeps changing please speak up.

Once this is up & running, open windows explorer to the grisoft avg folder, then update manually while watching the file listings in the avg folder. A new file avgas.exe will appear. Delete this file and you will be fine. Otherwise when windows starts next the new avgas.exe will be used and you will have lost your use of avg anti-spyware. Continue using _avgas.exe.

This has been posted in the past and the crack is old. Yes it works, but AVG has countered it by simply redownloading AVG.exe such that it will overwrite the crack. If you have to re-crack the program everytime you update, then that sucks! We need a more stable crack.
